title: My stay
text: Absolutely the worse booking site I‚Äôve ever used! A maintenance man in the building was allowed to lie and say I was smoking in the bathroom found out not to be true then tried to say I was stealing found out to be false and then I was put out of my reservation at 10pm at night and was told I can‚Äôt get a refund! Unless you want to be scammed out your money I don‚Äôt suggest it!

title: Garbage Company
text: So my wife and I canceled our Airbnb with ample time due to some personal issues yet they kept most of our money. The app blames the Host and the host by Ashlie blames the app company. Either way I would recommend you STAY FAR AWAY from use if them. Very back company. DONT say I didn‚Äôt warn you.

title: Poor quality search engine and horrible cancellation policies
text: So I have had a lot of horrible experiences with airbnb over the past few years and todays events are the final straw. So I attempted 4 different times to book a 2 night stay and each time the hosts asked me to withdraw because they didn‚Äôt have updated schedules loaded. So clearly this is stressful by itself. Well I tried a 5th time and this is where the app failed. My search was pretty simple I basically just filtered out extremely expensive places and anything less than 2 bedrooms. Well I found another acceptable place (I thought) I booked and wow it went through. I was on a road trip and got back 3 days later and was showing the bookings to my friends going and realized it was a 1br so I cancelled right away. I was only refunded 2/3 of my money. This was about 3-4 days after the booking and over 6 weeks before the trip. Basically they have horrible policies and a broken search engine. Overall the company shows it doesn‚Äôt care for us by not openly showing the ‚Äúcleaning fees‚Äù (turns out they don‚Äôt take a percentage of that fee, that‚Äôs why all the hosts have MASSIVE cleaning fees) you only see them when you go to check out and find out the cleaning fees are frequently the same cost as the nights stay and in some cases 2-3times that. The least the company could do is average that into the nightly costs. I highly suggest you find a different app to book through.

title: Need improvements
text: Don‚Äôt get me wrong I usually love using this app but lately trying to book a place with a friend group so supposedly suspicious for an unauthorized party? I‚Äôve tried so many different places but it keeps doing the same thing it‚Äôs over all annoying to me.I would update some things.

title: Better options exist. Hosts beware
text: Nearly every booking platform has similar offerings now and much better support such as booking.com hotels.com and Agoda. An available to hosts posting their units too. Warning to hosts - don‚Äôt waste your time with Airbnb. The customer support for a host is horrible. Airbnb erroneously deducted from my earnings and it took 5 tickets and an hour+ each time just to file the ticket and explain THEIR error and robbery. Then wait for a call back and then surprise! Abb closes the ticket without any resolution. And countless hosts are kicked off the site for 1* reviews. Hello! Some people just like to complain. A guest booked ‚Äòin error‚Äô no showed then asked for a refund then gave a 1* review and Airbnb refused to remove the bad review. So that‚Äôs why I say don‚Äôt bother with the app as a host. They can delete your listing and all your time and effort have been a waste and give you no recourse.

title: Good app
text: The app is good and easy to use. But the rules and check in and check out times are ridiculous. Some even have cameras inside the house.

title: The worst costumer service ever
text: not one person could do anything! they said they would call me a million times‚Ä¶ i got one call and that person said they would call me back . i would never recommend airbnb to anyone

title: Used to be good
text: I've had some rather amazing airbnb stays and then there are the nightmares. airbnb customer service cares nothing for the customer. At the time of writing this review the app is rated at 2.4 stars. Why doesn't apple disable them on the store?

title: New to Airbnb
text: So far I have found the format very useful and helpful.

title: App
text: Horrible to work with they closed my account and now it‚Äôs open again it‚Äôs very hit or miss with this app

title: App is so hard to use
text: It‚Äôs so hard to just get on and get on a map in area and look at house cause there is a stupid scroll bar at the top that is so hard to use. Literally just makes me angry and want to stop using it all together why can the choosing a beach house or view be in one of the tabs where you select if you want a hot tub and stuff like that. It literally makes me want to chuck my phone

title: Awful people awful app
text: Some of the worst people I ever met via this app

title: Update app
text: I can not update the app and when I click on support it tells me to update the app. Can you help?

title: Costumer service
text: In my experience with airbnb, costumer service is pretty much non-existent. They will just bounce you from team to team until you get tired and give up

title: Support team ruined our experience
text: We were trying to get a reservation at a Airbnb that allowed us to invite many people to visit there until 11pm. We were just planning to renew vows in front a small group of family and friends (adults were all over 25 years old and kids were all 11 years under)and have a relaxing day. We were definitely not planning to have a teen party. However Airbnb team banned us to book the location for a party risk. They completely ruined our special day. We called support team and explained everything but they didn‚Äôt listen us and refused to change their decision. Yes, I cried a lot. I have known the owner of that Airbnb since they were building it and I had been dreaming about booking it for some time. I guessed Airbnb team banned our account so we could not get any Airbnb anymore. We had terrible experience with this app and support team.

title: No quiero volver a usar Airbnb
text: Quisimos alquilar una casa en miami, para pasar un dia tranquilo en familia con piscina privada. Airbnb nos bloque√≥ la reserva alegando un supuesto party, cuando llamamos a custumer service, no tuvieron ninguna ayuda para ofrecernos. Nos comunicamos con los hostess de las casas nos quer√≠an ayudar pero Airbnb bloqueaba todas las reservas. Deber√≠an hacer que su servicio de atencion al cliente sirva para algo

title: El peor costumer service del 2024 nadie saber c√≥mo ayudarte
text: Hemos tratado de reservar un alojamiento entero y no es posible gracias a que ellos dicen que es probable que se haga una fiesta, muy poco profesional su costumer service

title: Horrible Experiences
text:
Airbnb is being marketed incorrectly as a way to ‚Äúquit your 9 to 5‚Äù. If you plan on HOSTING, expect guests to be very needy. Constantly needing something, and will usually attempt to charge back your reservation. Payments are not guaranteed. Google ‚ÄòAirbnb does not protect hosts‚Äô and you can see for yourself what comes up. Their host damage protection insurance failed me as I was waiting a few months for a payout after guests damaged our furniture and received absolutely nothing.

As a TRAVELER, I have face many instances of sexual harassment. All in all unsafe for women. You‚Äôre renting a small room with other people and paying a lot for no privacy. There are extensive ‚Äúhouse rules‚Äù and you will be expected to clean on top of that.

title: Horrible
text: Can never book anything for a large family idk why they have homes for 10 people but will not let you book horrible service font relay in this app for your stay at this point a hotel on Expedia had better service and options! Do not recommend!!

title: Notification alerts have changed to barely audible.
text: The latest update changed my notifications sound to something I can hardly hear. I‚Äôve spent some time looking for how to change the sound back but from what I can tell, this is not something we can adjust. Please help! I‚Äôm missing alerts!!

title: Hate Airbnb
text: As an owner of just one house that I listed fully furnished,  airbnb does not care about you. They‚Äôre chasing the Almighty Dollar. Twice they‚Äôve made changes on their app that changed my settings that caused me to lose a lot of money. Even when they admitted that it was a problem with the app, they still took my money, and you have no recourse. Airbnb will not stand behind the owner.

title: App full of glitches
text: I just started using the Airbnb app and haven't actually made a trip booked through them yet, but this app is a nightmare. After a while the photos start freezing and then the app shuts down and I have to reopen it and start over. The worst part is that with every little nudge on the map, listings will appear and disappear. As in, a listing will pop up in the center of the screen and I go to zoom in on the map there and it disappears, along with maybe one or two others, and others pop up; some others stay put. Sometimes if I nudge all around where I saw the listing disappear, I may be able to get it to pop back up, but sometimes it never comes bac! Just because I move the map a little bit does not mean my available listings in that same area should change. That makes no sense, especially for any to disappear as I zoom in. The whole experience is super glitchy.

title: Absolutely horrible customer service. Possibly the worst I have ever experienced.
text:
The incompetence of this company‚Äôs staff is astonishing. I have had the most chaotic, and unprofessional experince with them today. After 5 years of booking though air bnb. They have finally showed their true colors. If you ever experience any troubles with your bookings, their customer support is the least helpful I have ever seen. It took me over 7 hours of repeating myself, opening new cases that the company kept closing on me. Just to get a refund for a single night stay, at a apartment that should not have been permitted to list for air bnb. It was disgusting and people were using drugs and fighting in the apartment above us. Air bnb completely failed to help me find a new air bnb, and I was forced to book myself an entirely
New stay. Just to wake up in the morning and spend the next 6 hours trying to explain what happened just to get a refund. And I am still
In the process of getting my second booking refunded due to the incompetence of the company, and their inability to relocate us when we needed them too. They completely screwed me last night. And I am going to be contacting my lawyers about the way that the company handled my experience with them.

title: They don‚Äôt want me
text:
I checked my email this morning with one from air bnb saying that my account has been cancelled. No reason, no wait period or review, just gone.

I saved a lot of future vacations on the app and recently had my honeymoon that I would have loved to return to! 

When I contacted customer support they tried to help, but eventually told me I cancelled my own account and it could not be recovered. Don‚Äôt understand what I could have done wrong as a visitor with no account review and ‚Äúonly the specialized team is able to see the reason behind my cancellation‚Äù. There are other options to use, I suppose!

title: I used to be a frequent airbnb user‚Ä¶never again
text:
I got injured at my most recent airbnb due to unsafe conditions. AirBnB has historically been great at responding and resolving issues during my many stays, but this time they are avoiding questions and responses, sending misinformation, and providing me no direction with how to file a claim. I have used airbnb since they were a couch surfing website as a guest and a host. 

In addition they sanitize reviews, as many other reviewers have said. Reviews rarely accurately reflect major issues, since airbnb allows for the host to request to delete them after a refund is issued or a guest decides that the place is not habitable or accurately reflected in the listing. If I can‚Äôt access accurate reviews as a guest before my stays, then I cannot trust booking through them any longer.

title: Never Trusting Airbnb Again!!!
text: I am a 36 year old woman with a dog and a fianc√© who booked an Airbnb for a 6 month stay. I paid a little over $2000 dollars and the reservation was confirmed. I verified my drivers license and identity. Moments later, I got an email stating my reservation was canceled because I am a ‚Äúparty risk‚Äù. My account was deactivated, I contacted Airbnb customer service and no one there speaks proper English. I was told I have to wait 15 days to get my money back and as of tomorrow, my fianc√© and I have no where to go because Airbnb already charged my card. The representatives were rude, I was told that I had to wait 3 hours to speak with a manager. There escalation department only has an email. So now I‚Äôm homeless left waiting for a refund because they claimed that I was at risk for throwing a party, which is completely untrue. The Airbnb was booked because my fianc√© and I need a place to stay because we have to be out of our apartment by tomorrow.

title: HOTELS >>>>> AIRBNB
text:
The cleaning fee and other hidden, random & surprise fees set by owner of property is always ridiculous. $290 cleaning fee on a $61/ 1 night stay, and given a list of chores to do before I leave or be charged another cleaning ?!?! üòÇ Why the platform allows dishonest fees to be incurred & no % cap on what fees like cleaning can be is B.S.

At this point, hotels make more sense.
Same cost, less headache & far less likely to overcharge me by surprise.

Create some rules for the D-Bag property owners / management that use your platform. It‚Äôs getting outta hand.

title: Can‚Äôt trust these people!
text: It‚Äôs the 3rd time I am using this app to book a multi-week stay. It‚Äôs the 3rd time the property doesn‚Äôt match the description! Totally unacceptable!

title: New Party Restriction Rule
text: I was looking to get an entire home for the weekend for my family members and I to have dinner since my apartment is to small to fit all 8 of us. I looked for a home in my area since we all live local and my dogs would stay behind (that way I would only be up the street to check on them when needed) I contacted the host beforehand for approval and they didn‚Äôt mind at all. As I go to book i get a restriction that there may be an unauthorized party happening which is not the case at all. I contacted Airbnb support to explain and see if they could do something about it. After an hour I received a message saying my request was denied and I am only allowed to book a hotel and/or a private room which is absurd and ridiculous considering the fact we wouldn‚Äôt fit or be able to cook dinner there. As I‚Äôm doing a deep dive on why I received this restriction on Reddit I come to find out I‚Äôm not the only one with this issue. It seem Airbnb has restrictions if you try and book an entire home to be exact in your area and if under the age of 25. This is ridiculous as many people book in their area for many many reasons. Definitely never booking again with Airbnb you‚Äôre better off trying Vrbo or other vacation rental websites.

title: You will not record Air BnB!
text: First and most suspect I asked Air bnb manager to call me. When they did they said they would be recording the call, so I said I would to. They said they do not give permission?! What?! You are recording it already why can‚Äôt I. And they hung up! I asked for a manager to call because their auto correct changed County to Country and I needed that corrected. Their chat Supposedly ‚ÄúSuper Hosts‚Äù customer service didn‚Äôt read the question correctly and gave me the wrong information. When I straightened that out they said they couldn‚Äôt help. The ‚Äúsystem‚Äù won‚Äôt allow us to correct words. News Flash‚Ä¶.the system was set up by real people who can help if asked! So I asked and we are back to them not wanting to be recorded and hanging up on me! Yikes. What are they hiding from and where is the ‚ÄúSuper Host‚Äù customer service?!

title: Unable to see inbox messages in app
text: I use the app infrequently and lately made a reservation through app. Everything worked well until the message screen shows blank white screen whenever I try to click on an message in my inbox! My host has been sending messages and I am not able to view them in the app but have to login to the browser to view them! Please fix the bug with the inbox messages in the app.

title: Reviews
text:
Extremely frusterated as a host. Over the phone the guest said they would leave a bad review if I did not give them a partial refund. They were careful not to write it anywhere.

I let them leave early and refunded the rest of their stay. They left a horrible review and said the furnace was broken. I had a professional company out the same day that said it was completely fine and gave me the documentation to send to Airbnb. Airbnb said they saw the guest was lying but it was against policy to remove the review.

Far too many guests hold me hostage by saying over the phone they'll leave a bad review if I don't refund them for lack of towels or some other easy complaint and Airbnb REFUSES to remove the review even if it is verifiably false. SOLVE THIS PROBLEM FOR HOSTS

title: Terrible Company!!
text: My siblings and I simply wanted to rent a 4 bedroom house so we could travel to and visit our elderly father for his birthday. There are 4 of us hence the wanting a 4 bedroom spot. We tried to reserve it. We get blocked saying we‚Äôre trying to throw an unauthorized party. We‚Äôre confused by this so we call. Talk with the tech team explain the situation they said they‚Äôll email us with a decision. Whelp they decided they were right and that‚Äôs what we were doing. I honestly believe it shows the racist side of this company. (My African American father and I is my profile picture) I will no longer use this company, or refer this company to anyone. Terrible company! Shame on them!!

title: App might function well but the policy is awful
text: Had a good run at first with Airbnb but then a host decided that they could throw false accusations at me and Airbnb did nothing to defend the me. They will let the host get away with anything they want. I will never use this subpar company again.

title: Distance
text: I absolutely understand why you cannot post the exact address of the rentals, however I would love to be able to browse by distance from a location.

title: No dark view
text: It‚Äôs 2024. Implement the dark view

title: They sanitize reviews!!
text: I know from personal experience. Don‚Äôt trust the reviews. They only show the good ones.

title: Extremely Disappointed with Airbnb Customer Service
text: I recently had a terrible experience with Airbnb's customer service. Despite multiple attempts to resolve an issue, the support team was unhelpful and seemed indifferent to my concerns. This lack of assistance has left me frustrated and disappointed with Airbnb's overall service.

title: Beware of cancellation policy no refunds no stay
text: Very disappointed in the app. I paid for a week visit, but then my technician got attacked by a dog so we had to push it back a few weeks. I asked to cancel and they said no. They also said no refund. I said fine I‚Äôll stay I‚Äôll find someone else to take his place and they said your reservation is not available‚Ä¶. This app is a scam. Beware.

title: Worst customer service ever
text: The Airbnb support team has to be the rudest customer service team ever. I talked to multiple representatives, all of which cut me off, lacked compassion, and did not help me resolve the issue. They transfer me back and forth to each other saying that this team member would be able to further assist me and I‚Äôve been stuck in the loop for 2-3 days now. I am not one to go out of my way to write nasty reviews and I understand customer service is a difficult job. I‚Äôm extremely disappointed with this side of Airbnb.

title: Airbnb scammers
text: above Diyalye with excellent reviews, when I arrived I was robbed, of course I didn‚Äôt live there, I wrote in support, two days later they wrote to me what happened to you üòÇüòÇüòÇ I said that I was robbed and I will live there no longer. I asked for a refund, the next day they told me that this was impossible and wished me good luck, closing the chat unilaterally. I donated $1400 to the company in 12 days, thank you very much, I used your service for the first time and you robbed me

title: Renter beware
text: Airbnb enables host scammers to claim damages so they can fix up their broken properties by claiming renters did damage. Know that Airbnb will not take the renters side unless you can prove you did not damage something which is next to impossible to prove a negative.

title: Aggressive/Threatening Host
text: I‚Äôve always loved this app and community, but that impression has soured after a foreign hosting company called and threatened my girlfriend after presenting several hidden fees and wanting additional payment outside the app. AirBNB sided with the company in spite of them being known for coercive tactics across multiple platforms

title: Fees are too high
text: Airbnb used to be the best for traveling. Now fees are almost as much as the total cost for lodging. I used to stay away from hotels but now I avoid airbnb.

title: Airbnb Experience never reduced me
text: I purchased an Airbnb Experience for $230 that never showed up on my app. The host never got the reservation either. I called the customer service 4 times but they never refunded my money. Every single representative kept saying we‚Äôre working to fix the bug. I told them the bug in your system is not my problem and since experience never happened I just want my money back. They closed the tickets every time without refunding me. I understand apps have bugs but not refunding a customer for a service that was never rendered is unacceptable. Worst customer service experience I‚Äôve had ever.

title: Messages not working for hosting
text: From time to time when I send a message hosting my experience the app says ‚ÄúFailed to send‚Äù

title: Worst experience for your money
text: Prices comparable and often higher than hotels for places with roaches, under construction, noisy, dirty, with mold and with endless other issues. Absolutely not client oriented support, forget about ‚Äúrefund‚Äù word at all, enjoy absolutely terrible experiences for your money.

title: User interface is rough
text: The UX of this app is complicated and unclear. Why can‚Äôt I view all airbnbs in a location at a time? Why do I need to filter on beach or lake or views? Incredibly frustrating. Used airbnb for years and at this point the UX makes it unusable sadly.

title: From a Host Perspective:
text:
As a guest, love the Airbnb app. So easy to use. 

As a host, absolutely dislike what happened to the "Earnings" section and how you can't click into it anymore from the "Insights" summary. That toggle was common sense to me and very user friendly. Earnings section needs improvement and better reporting capabilities.

title: mixed
text:
i have used mostly the app and it‚Äôs suited to do most of the things. i needed to contact AirBNB support through the app. it‚Äôs really a pain to go back and forth between support chat and reservation details. if you have had previous support chats, they‚Äôre often listed as ‚Äúin progress‚Äù (after 6 months?) and the current chat is in the middle somewhere. in order to access the current one, you have to click on ‚Äúcontact us‚Äù, which you already have. the support guy at the other end doesn‚Äôt have access to all your info, and refers you to the website and asks whether it‚Äôs possible for you to use a laptop with chrome or mozilla firefox. then he‚Äôs disappeared.
Addendum: if you have reservation that you want to give the support guy, good luck. you can‚Äôt select the code; so you can‚Äôt copy it. 
i don‚Äôt know if there might be other problems with the app, but this experience has not left me with a good feeling.
